alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 7:51AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL FAIRFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN NEW HAVEN COUNTIES THROUGH 830 AM EDT... At 751 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Southbury, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Naugatuck, Southbury, Wolcott, Newtown, Hamden, Cheshire, Seymour, Prospect, Woodbridge, Middlebury, Beacon Falls, Bethany, and Oxford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
